definition: the truth about sth/the actual facts
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
the whole truth is revealed (idiom); everything becomes clear
real face fully revealed (idiom); fig. to unmask and expose the whole truth
to set the record straight/to clarify the facts

sentences.english: Truth? A pebble of quartz? For once, then, something.
sentences.chinese: 真相？一块石英？只一次，便成永远。

sentences.english: An internal member leaked information, so I got to know the truth.
sentences.chinese: 内部人员的露风，我得知了事情的真相。

sentences.english: In fact, it is one that will shake him-and many others-to the core.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，真相让他和很多人内心深处受到极大震撼。

sentences.english: You should try to acquaint yourself with the facts, before you express an opinion.
sentences.chinese: 在发表看法前，你应该先了解事实真相。

sentences.english: He will shine through your idle thoughts today, and help you understand the truth of love.
sentences.chinese: 他今天会照透你的无谓的杂念，帮你了解爱的真相。

sentences.english: In the guise of a fiction, the truth about himself is articulated.
sentences.chinese: 在虚幻的伪装下，他自我的真相得到了清晰的表达。

sentences.english: The unfinalizability of dialogue forces reader to find the truth of the Sutpen s tragedy.
sentences.chinese: 对话的未终结性迫使读者参与到找出真相的活动中来。

sentences.english: Once my family knew the truth, they helped give me the strength to walk away from the situation.
sentences.chinese: 我娘家人了解真相后，给了我力量走出困境。

sentences.english: Sometimes a mediated conversation will straighten things out, and a little discussion and apology can calm the waters.
sentences.chinese: 有时调解可以弄清真相，讨论和道歉能平息风波。

sentences.english: Yi Yi surprised to learn the truth and exasperated, accusing children s four seasons in calculating.
sentences.chinese: 易奕获知真相惊怒交加，指责童四季攻于心计。

sentences.english: These regressive minds here need to here the truth.
sentences.chinese: 这些丧尽天良的人需要在这里听一听真相。

sentences.english: I’ll be debunking these lies and giving you the truth behind them.
sentences.chinese: 我将揭穿这些谎言并且把后面的真相告诉你。

sentences.english: You cannot behold the world and know God.
sentences.chinese: 你无法两眼望着世界，同时又知道上主的真相。

sentences.english: We must carry on with the investigation until all the facts are found.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须继续查讯，直至真相大白。

sentences.english: But the true events of that day are shrouded in mystery.
sentences.chinese: 但当天的事件真相仍笼罩在神秘的气氛之中。

definition: the whole truth is revealed (idiom); everything becomes clear
to expose/to unmask/to ferret out/to disclose/disclosure
as the water recedes, the rocks appear (idiom)/the truth comes to light
